text.text_translated: Sometimes a bridge falls down and people do not know why. Engineers need to do a complete study to understand the reason. Sometimes, this happens because the material in the bridge was bad. Or it happens because an important part of the bridge had a problem. In other cases, the builders made the bridge for a certain weight. The bridge could not support more weight.
